接触感染或自身免疫性疾病与痴呆症发病率相关吗？医院发现的感染、自身免疫性疾病和痴呆症发病之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Is-exposure-to-infections-or-autoimmune-diseases- Associated-with-dementia-incidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Is-exposure-to-infections-or-autoimmune-diseases- Associated-with-dementia-incidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dcc65e8-3627-401d-8c52-e592e08c0ecd Tue, 12 Sep 2023 03:25:00 -0400 Is exposure to infections or autoimmune diseases associated with dementia incidence?
加拿大慢性阻塞性肺病住院人数急剧上升，尤其是年轻女性根据 CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）的最新研究，自 2002 年以来，加拿大每年因慢性阻塞性肺疾病 (COPD) 入院的人数增加了 69%，尤其是女性和 65 岁以下人群 https://www.cmaj.ca/查找/doi/10.1503/cmaj.221051。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/COPD-hospitalizations-rising-sharply-in-Canada-special-among-younger-females.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/COPD-hospitalizations-rising-sharply-in-Canada-special-among-younger-females.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92edf962-44c2-4f0e-8aa8-2385609ea112 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 23:09:42 -0400 COPD hospitalizations rising sharply in Canada, especially among younger females
新的机器学习算法可以帮助优化下一代治疗抗体抗体治疗或许能够激活免疫系统来对抗帕金森氏症、阿尔茨海默氏症和结直肠癌等疾病，但当它们与自身和其他非疾病标志分子结合时，其效果就会较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/New-machine-learning-algorithms-can-help-optimize-the-next- Generation-of-therapeutic-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/New-machine-learning-algorithms-can-help-optimize-the-next- Generation-of-therapeutic-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a372712a-83bf-4fbd-a835-d50a804fadbd Mon, 11 Sep 2023 23:01:47 -0400 New machine-learning algorithms can help optimize the next-generation of therapeutic antibodies
健康的生活方式可以预防抑郁症吗？一项开创性的研究表明，无论遗传倾向如何，保持健康的生活方式（包括良好的睡眠、社交联系和定期锻炼）都可以显着降低患抑郁症的风险。该研究强调，生活方式的选择可能比遗传对抑郁风险的影响更大，这为预防提供了可行的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Can-a-healthy-lifestyle-keep-depression-at-bay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Can-a-healthy-lifestyle-keep-depression-at-bay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a8df8f3-c9b4-4286-92d0-47d0dc9b73b4 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 22:52:00 -0400 Can a healthy lifestyle keep depression at bay?
